targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.CPU.contextswitch|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid"

panels.title: CPU context switch for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "cpu_nr" =~ /$cpu$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "cpu_nr"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "cpu_nr" =~ /$cpu$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "cpu_nr"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "cpu_nr" =~ /$cpu$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "cpu_nr"

panels.title: Number of thread for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.memory.swap.used|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.memory.swap.left|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "disk.iops.read|m" WHERE "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "disk.iops.write|m" WHERE "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: IOPS for virtual device for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "disk.iops.read|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "device" =~ /$device$/ AND "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "device"

SELECT mean(value) FROM "disk.iops.write|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "type" = 'physical' AND "device" =~ /$device$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "device"

panels.title: IOPS for physical device for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) * (1024*1024) FROM "network.throughput.incoming|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "mac" =~ /$mac$/ AND "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "type", "mac", "nic"

SELECT mean(value) * (1024*1024)  FROM "network.throughput.outgoing|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "mac" =~ /$mac$/ AND "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "type", "mac", "nic"

panels.title: Network throughput for virtual interface for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "network.throughput.incoming|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid/ AND "type" = 'physical' AND "nic" =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "gid", "nic", "nid" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "network.throughput.outgoing|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid/ AND "type" = 'physical' AND "nic" =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "gid", "nic", "nid" fill(null)

panels.title: Network throughput for physical interfaces for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "network.packets.rx|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "mac" =~ /$mac$/ AND "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "type", "mac", "nic"

SELECT mean(value) FROM "network.packets.tx|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "mac" =~ /$mac$/ AND "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "type", "mac", "nic"

panels.title: Packets for virtual interface for gid:$gid nid:$nid

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "network.packets.rx|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "type", "mac", "nic"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "network.packets.tx|m" WHERE "nid" =~ /$nid$/ AND "gid" =~ /$gid$/ AND "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nid", "gid", "type", "mac", "nic"

panels.title: Packets for physical interface for gid:$gid nid:$nid
